title: Entire team dc during rank.

embed.description: Every game is a story; visit the new League of Legends match history to check out how this one ends and share your own!

body:
So I happend like this.
1. I was leaning against Yasuo as jax.
2. Zac came to gank.
3. We killed Yasuo.
4. 20 sec after only my team got disconnected. 
5. Lost the game cause everybody stood still and had a free lane for 1-2 min.

Support won't open the ticket.

replies.body:
I think this is a Jax bug

or at least there are a ton more of these situations happening since 7.19, and jax is always in the game

Just because your ticket hasn't been answered yet doesn't mean they aren't going to. Sometimes their queues get a little backed up, and the average response time for EU can be around 18 hours. After checking though, it doesn't actually look like you have any current tickets for this issue though.

If you're still getting disconnected, take some proactive troubleshooting steps to adjust your network settings. Hit up our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) and run through those steps as they typically help improve your connection quality a bit.
